info.name: Youtube Smallscreen
info.description: A nice dark theme with a cool font, easy on the eyes and great in dark settings. Based off of Youtube Bigscreen 2.0. Tested with Chrome, Firefox, and Safari.
info.additionalInfo: This style is based on Youtube Bigscreen 2.0, and is made with lower resolution and smaller screens in mind. Release notes: 3.0 - Sidebar background fixed after Youtube update. 2.0 - User background images removed on user channel pages and spacing between the video and comment section removed on user channel pages. 1.0 - initial release
